name: The only way out is through
vision_statement: Humanity reaches the stars by failing to save the earth. Things get so bad that humans have to learn to live in sealed environments underground. Eventually, humanity uses the technology and skills built by learning to live underground, and translates them into the ability to live indefinitely in space or on another hostile planet/moon/asteriod, etc.
output: An abstract animation representing humanity's journey from the surface of the earth to the middle of the earth, then out into the stars.
